Class Movie

java.lang.Object
com.group18.model.Movie
public class Movie extends Object
Represents a movie with properties such as title, genres, summary, poster image data, and duration. This class provides functionality to manage movie details, including adding or removing genres and handling image data for the movie's poster.

  • Field Details

    • movieId

      private int movieId
      Represents the unique identifier for a movie. This identifier is used to differentiate each movie within the system.

    • title

      private String title
      Represents the title of the movie. This field stores the name of the movie as a string.

    • genres

      private Set<String> genres
      Represents the set of genres associated with a movie. Each genre is stored as a unique string in the set. This field allows categorization and filtering of movies based on their genres.

    • summary

      private String summary
      A brief textual description of the movie's plot or key points. This provides an overview of the movie content to users.

    • posterData

      private byte[] posterData
      Represents the binary data of the poster image associated with the movie. Typically used to store and retrieve the movie's visual representation.

    • duration

      private int duration
      Represents the duration of the movie in minutes.

  • Constructor Details

    • Movie

      public Movie()
      Default constructor for the Movie class. This constructor initializes a new instance of the Movie object with default values.

    • Movie

      public Movie(String title, Set<String> genres, String summary, byte[] posterData, int duration)
      Constructs a new Movie object with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the movie.
      genres - A set of genres associated with the movie. If null, an empty set is assigned.
      summary - A brief summary or description of the movie.
      posterData - A byte array containing the data for the movie's poster image.
      duration - The duration of the movie in minutes.

  • Method Details

    • getPosterData

      public byte[] getPosterData()
      Retrieves the binary data of the movie's poster image.
      Returns:
      A byte array representing the movie's poster image data, or null if no poster data is available.

    • setPosterData

      public void setPosterData(byte[] posterData)
      Sets the poster data for the movie.
      Parameters:
      posterData - An array of bytes representing the poster image data.

    • getPosterImage

      public javafx.scene.image.Image getPosterImage()
      Retrieves the poster image for the movie. Converts the byte array representing the poster data to an Image object.
      Returns:
      the poster image as an Image object if the poster data is available and valid, otherwise returns null.

    • getMovieId

      public int getMovieId()
      Retrieves the unique identifier of the movie.
      Returns:
      The unique identifier of the movie as an integer.

    • setMovieId

      public void setMovieId(int movieId)
      Sets the unique identifier for the movie.
      Parameters:
      movieId - The unique identifier of the movie.

    • getTitle

      public String getTitle()
      Retrieves the title of the movie.
      Returns:
      the title of the movie as a String

    • setTitle

      public void setTitle(String title)
      Sets the title of the movie.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the movie to be set.

    • getGenres

      public Set<String> getGenres()
      Retrieves the set of genres associated with the movie.
      Returns:
      a set of strings representing the genres of the movie.

    • setGenres

      public void setGenres(Set<String> genres)
      Sets the genres for the movie.
      Parameters:
      genres - A set of strings representing the genres of the movie.

    • addGenre

      public void addGenre(String genre)
      Adds a genre to the set of genres associated with the movie. If the genres set has not been initialized, it initializes it before adding the genre.
      Parameters:
      genre - the genre to be added to the movie's genre collection

    • removeGenre

      public void removeGenre(String genre)
      Removes the specified genre from the set of genres associated with the Movie. If the genres set is null, no action is performed.
      Parameters:
      genre - the genre to be removed from the Movie's genres set

    • getGenresAsString

      public String getGenresAsString()
      Converts the set of genres associated with a movie into a single string, with each genre separated by a comma and a space.
      Returns:
      a string representation of the movie's genres, separated by commas.

    • setGenresFromString

      public void setGenresFromString(String genresStr)
      Sets the genres of the movie from a comma-separated string. Each genre in the string is trimmed of leading and trailing whitespace and added to the set of genres. If the input string is null or empty, the genres set is cleared.
      Parameters:
      genresStr - A comma-separated string containing genres, or null/empty to clear the genres set.

    • getSummary

      public String getSummary()
      Retrieves the summary of the movie.
      Returns:
      The summary of the movie as a string.

    • setSummary

      public void setSummary(String summary)
      Sets the summary of the movie.
      Parameters:
      summary - The summary of the movie to set.

    • getDuration

      public int getDuration()
      Retrieves the duration of the movie.
      Returns:
      The duration of the movie in minutes.

    • setDuration

      public void setDuration(int duration)
      Sets the duration of the movie in minutes.
      Parameters:
      duration - The duration of the movie in minutes.
